problems.title: Three problems every entrepreneur knows
problems.description: If you recognize yourself in at least one of these, you're in the right place

problem1.title: My website doesn't bring clients
problem1.description: Amateur design, confusing navigation, invisible call-to-actions. The result? Traffic that doesn't convert.

problem2.title: Too long to get a website
problem2.description: Months of waiting, endless revisions, missed deadlines. Meanwhile, the competition passes you by.

problem3.title: I don't understand anything technical
problem3.description: Hosting, CMS, SEO, analytics. Incomprehensible terms and no one to really explain how it works.

solution.title: The solution: a partner focused on your success
solution.description: You're not just a client with a project. You're a business that wants to grow. That's why every website we create is designed to convert visitors into customers.

prop1.title: Guaranteed delivery
prop1.subtitle: 7-14 days
prop1.description: Certain timelines, no surprises. Written guarantee: 10% discount for each day of delay.

prop2.title: Design that converts
prop2.subtitle: +180% contact requests
prop2.description: Every element designed to guide the user toward action: purchase, contact, booking.

prop3.title: Zero technical worries
prop3.subtitle: All included
prop3.description: Hosting, SEO, analytics, training. You manage the business, we handle the technology.

prop4.title: Zero risk
prop4.subtitle: Triple guarantee
prop4.description: 100% refund if unsatisfied + 2 revisions + 30 days free support.

portfolio.title: Projects that speak for themselves
portfolio.description: Two case studies that show how a well-made website can transform your business

gallery.title: Our projects
gallery.description: Discover how we helped our clients grow online

fl1.subtitle: Corporate Website with AI Integration

webDesign.name: Web Design

backend.name: Backend

seo.name: SEO

ai.detail: Custom GPT-4 chatbot for 24/7 support and lead qualification

fl1.description: Complete digital transformation for FL1, a leading B2B company. We designed an integrated digital ecosystem: premium corporate website, AI chatbot that autonomously handles initial prospect contact and qualifies leads in real-time, and bidirectional HubSpot CRM integration to track every interaction. The result? An automated sales system working 24/7, reducing workload on the sales team while dramatically increasing conversion rates.

flowmatics.subtitle: B2B Marketing Automation Platform

webDesign.name: Web Design
webDesign.detail: Landing page with micro-animations and visual storytelling

seo.name: SEO
seo.detail: Complete SEO strategy: keyword research, content pillars and link building

cro.name: CRO
cro.detail: Continuous A/B testing, heatmaps and multi-step funnel optimization

flowmatics.description: FlowMatics faced a challenge: communicating a complex marketing automation platform to a demanding B2B audience. We created a landing page that tells the product story through fluid animations and interactive demos. The minimalist yet impactful design guides users through a discovery journey culminating in a demo request. Thanks to a targeted SEO strategy and continuous data-driven optimization, FlowMatics now dominates strategic keywords in the Italian marketing automation sector.

quickfy-web.subtitle: SaaS Marketing Website

webDesign.name: Web Design
webDesign.detail: Premium SaaS design with embedded product demo and 3D animations

seo.name: SEO
seo.detail: SaaS SEO: comparison pages, feature pages and blog strategy

cro.name: CRO
cro.detail: Optimized pricing page with social proof and urgency triggers

quickfy-web.description: Quickfy is a fast-growing analytics and marketing automation platform. Their previous website failed to communicate the product's value. We redesigned the entire experience: an interactive demo letting prospects 'try' the product directly from the homepage, a pricing page with clear and convincing plan comparison, and a nurturing system guiding every visitor toward conversion. Bounce rate dropped 37% and they now generate qualified leads consistently every week.

quickfy-app.subtitle: Analytics Dashboard & AI Automations

frontend.name: Frontend
frontend.detail: React 19 dashboard with real-time updates and advanced data visualizations

backend.name: Backend
backend.detail: AWS microservices architecture with auto-scaling and Redis caching

ai.name: AI & Automations
ai.detail: MCP server for Claude, n8n workflows, custom GPT-4 chatbot

devops.name: DevOps
devops.detail: GitHub Actions CI/CD, Datadog monitoring, blue-green deploy

quickfy-app.description: The technological heart of Quickfy: an enterprise-grade SaaS platform we built from scratch. Analytics dashboard with real-time charts and advanced filters, a powerful automation engine based on MCP server that orchestrates cross-channel marketing campaigns, and an AI chatbot trained on client data that autonomously handles interactions. The cloud-native architecture ensures exceptional performance even under load, with 500+ active users saving an average of 15 hours per week thanks to intelligent automations.

testimonials.title: What they say about us
testimonials.description: Our clients' words are worth more than a thousand promises

testimonial1.name: Marco Benetti
testimonial1.text: In 10 days I had a website that finally represents the quality of my work. Inquiries tripled and now I can proudly show my portfolio to clients.

testimonial2.name: Sofia Rossi
testimonial2.text: Professionalism and clarity from the first contact. They immediately understood our needs and the result exceeds expectations. Support always available.

testimonial3.name: Luca Marino
testimonial3.text: Booking system that works great. Timelines respected to the letter and support always available. 100% recommended.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know before starting

q1.question: How long does it really take?
q1.answer: 7-14 business days depending on complexity. Landing page 7 days, business website 10 days, e-commerce 14 days. With written guarantee: 10% discount for each day of delay.

q2.question: What happens if I don't like the result?
q2.answer: Don't worry, we work together step by step. We involve you in every decision: color choices, layout, content. You have 2 rounds of revisions included and we approve each phase before moving forward. So the final result will be exactly what you had in mind.

q3.question: Can I update the site myself afterward?
q3.answer: Absolutely yes. The site includes an intuitive management panel to edit texts, images, and content independently. We provide complete training and documentation to make you self-sufficient.

q4.question: Does the price include hosting and domain?
q4.answer: Yes, first year included in project price. From second year: hosting €150-300/year, domain €15-30/year depending on needs.

q5.question: Will the site be visible on Google?
q5.answer: Yes, basic or advanced SEO included: sitemap, meta tags, optimized speed, mobile-first structure. For guaranteed results, we also offer ongoing SEO consulting.

q6.question: Do you offer maintenance after launch?
q6.answer: Yes, first 30 days of free support included. Then maintenance packages from €150-400/month: updates, backups, technical support, minor changes.

q7.question: What integrations are included?
q7.answer: Every plan includes essential integrations: Google Analytics, Meta Pixel, contact forms, and GDPR cookie consent. Higher plans also include Google Maps, Mailchimp/Brevo, and (for E-commerce) Stripe Checkout. For advanced integrations like AI chatbot, Zapier automations, or WhatsApp Business, we offer dedicated add-ons.

q8.question: Can I add features after launch?
q8.answer: Absolutely yes. You can add AI chatbot, automations, CRM integrations, members area, or other features at any time. We'll provide a dedicated quote and implement everything without interrupting your site.

privacyPolicy.metaDescription: Pixarts (Fl1 s.r.o.) Privacy Policy. Information on personal data processing under GDPR.
privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy

section1.title: Data Controller
section1.intro: The Data Controller for personal data processing is:

voluntary.title: Data voluntarily provided by the user
voluntary.intro: Through the contact form we collect:
voluntary.name: Full name

automatic.title: Automatically collected data
automatic.intro: During website navigation, the following data is automatically collected:

cookies.title: Data collected via cookies
cookies.intro: For detailed information about cookies used, please see our

section3.title: Purposes and Legal Basis of Processing

section4.title: Processing Methods
section4.intro: Personal data is processed using electronic and/or paper tools, with logic strictly related to the purposes indicated above and, in any case, in a way that guarantees the security and confidentiality of the data.

security.title: Security measures adopted:
security.access: Data access limited to authorized personnel

thirdParty.title: Third-party embedded content
thirdParty.intro: The site may embed content from:

others.title: Other recipients
others.consultants: Legal and tax consultants, for mandatory compliance

section7.title: Extra-EU Data Transfers
section7.intro: Some of our service providers are located outside the European Economic Area (EEA), particularly in the United States.
section7.basedOn: For these transfers we rely on:

adequacy.title: European Commission adequacy decision
adequacy.desc: EU-US Data Privacy Framework for certified providers

section8.title: Data Subject Rights
section8.intro: Under Articles 15-22 of the GDPR, you have the right to:

rights.accessDesc: Obtain confirmation of processing and a copy of your data
rights.portabilityDesc: Receive your data in a structured, readable format
rights.objectionDesc: Object to processing based on legitimate interest

howTo.title: How to exercise your rights
howTo.intro: You can exercise your rights by sending a request to:
howTo.response: We will respond to your request within 30 days. In complex cases, the deadline may be extended by an additional 60 days, with prior notice.

complaint.title: Complaint to Supervisory Authority
complaint.intro: You have the right to lodge a complaint with the Data Protection Authority:

section9.title: Data Provision
section9.content: Providing data marked as mandatory in the contact form is necessary to respond to your request. Failure to provide this data makes it impossible to process the request. Optional data allows us to provide a more personalized service but is not essential.

section10.title: Automated Decision-Making
section10.content: We do not carry out automated decision-making processes, including profiling, that produce legal effects or significantly affect you.

section11.title: Minors
section11.content: Our services are intended for a professional audience (businesses and professionals). We do not knowingly collect personal data from minors under 16 years of age. If you believe we have collected data from a minor, please contact us immediately.

section12.title: Changes to Privacy Policy
section12.content: We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will be published on this page with an indication of the last modification date. For substantial changes, we will notify you via a notice on the site or, if we have your email address for marketing purposes, via direct communication.

section13.title: Contacts
section13.intro: For any questions regarding this Privacy Policy or the processing of your personal data:

privacyPolicy.footer: This Privacy Policy complies with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (GDPR) and applicable data protection legislation.

cookiePolicy.metaDescription: Pixarts (Fl1 s.r.o.) Cookie Policy. Information on the use of cookies under GDPR and ePrivacy Directive.
cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy

section1.title: What are Cookies
section1.intro: Cookies are small text files that websites save on your device (computer, smartphone, tablet) during browsing. They store useful information to improve the browsing experience.
section1.technologies: Similar technologies to cookies include: pixel tags, web beacons, local storage, and device identifiers.

technical.title: Technical Cookies (always active)
technical.intro: These cookies are essential for the website to function and do not require your consent.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.intro: They help us understand how visitors interact with the site, collecting information anonymously.
analytics.ipNote: We use Google Analytics 4 with IP address anonymization enabled. This means your IP is truncated before being transmitted to Google servers, ensuring greater privacy.

marketing.title: Marketing/Profiling Cookies
marketing.intro: These cookies are used to show you relevant advertisements and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies (Embedded Content)
thirdParty.intro: When we embed content from external services, they may set their own cookies.

youtube.note: When possible, we embed YouTube videos in "privacy enhanced" mode (youtube-nocookie.com) to limit tracking.

social.title: Social Widgets
social.desc: Social sharing buttons may set cookies to track your activity. These are loaded only after your consent.

basis.legitimate: Legitimate interest (Art. 6.1.f GDPR) - necessary for operation

banner.title: Cookie Banner
banner.intro: On your first visit to the site, you will be shown a banner that allows you to:
banner.modify: You can change your preferences at any time by clicking the "Manage Cookies" link in the site footer.

browser.title: Browser Settings
browser.intro: You can also manage cookies through your browser settings:
browser.warningText: Disabling all cookies may compromise the functionality of some parts of the site.

optout.title: Specific Opt-outs
optout.intro: You can disable tracking for specific services:

section6.title: Data Transfer
section6.intro: Some third-party cookies involve the transfer of data to countries outside the European Union, particularly the United States.
section6.basedOn: For these transfers we rely on:

section7.title: Retention Period
section7.content: Each cookie has a specific duration indicated in the tables above. Session cookies are deleted when the browser is closed, while persistent cookies remain on the device for the indicated period or until manually deleted.

section8.title: Your Rights

rights.informed: Be informed about the cookies used
rights.modify: Change your preferences at any time
rights.request: Request information about data collected through cookies

section8.moreInfo: To exercise your rights, see the dedicated section in our

section9.title: Updates
section9.content1: This Cookie Policy may be updated periodically to reflect changes to the cookies used or applicable regulations.
section9.content2: The date of the last modification is indicated at the beginning of the document. We invite you to periodically consult this page.

section10.title: Contacts
section10.intro: For questions about the Cookie Policy:

cookiePolicy.footer: This Cookie Policy is drafted in compliance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (GDPR), Directive 2002/58/EC (ePrivacy), and the Italian Data Protection Authority's provision of May 8, 2014.

cookieConsent.title: We use cookies
cookieConsent.description: This site uses technical cookies necessary for operation and, with your consent, analytics and marketing cookies to improve your experience.
cookieConsent.necessaryDesc: Essential for the website to function. They cannot be disabled.
cookieConsent.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how you use the site to improve it.
cookieConsent.marketingDesc: Used to show you ads relevant to your interests.

portfolioPage.metaDescription: Discover web projects created by Pixarts: business websites, landing pages, web apps and SaaS platforms. Case studies with real results.
portfolioPage.title: Our
portfolioPage.description: Discover how we've helped our clients grow online with custom web solutions
portfolioPage.ctaDescription: Let's talk about how we can help your business grow online.
portfolioPage.noProjects: No projects found in this category
portfolioPage.ctaSectionDescription: Every project starts with a concrete goal. Tell us yours and let’s design the solution together.

singleflo.subtitle: All-in-One ERP Platform with AI
singleflo.description: SingleFlo is revolutionizing how European SMEs manage their business. We created a landing page that effectively communicates the power of this Odoo 18-based ERP platform: CRM, sales, manufacturing, invoicing and customer support unified with integrated artificial intelligence. The design highlights the key promise - 48-hour setup - through a visual journey guiding visitors from feature discovery to demo request. 98/100 Performance Score and perfect SEO Score ensure visibility and speed.

webDesign.name: Web Design
webDesign.detail: Enterprise design with GPU-accelerated animations and micro-interactions

seo.name: SEO
seo.detail: Perfect technical SEO: green Core Web Vitals, complete schema markup, dynamic sitemap

biemme.subtitle: Construction Company Website
biemme.description: Biemme 2 is a construction company with over 30 years of history and 200+ apartments built. Their previous website didn't reflect this solidity. We designed a digital presence to match: corporate design with a burgundy palette that conveys reliability, project portfolio with immersive galleries, and strong local SEO optimization positioning them at the top of 'construction company' searches in their area. ISO 9001 and SOA certifications are now showcased as trust elements, converting visitors into concrete quote requests.

webDesign.name: Web Design
webDesign.detail: Authoritative corporate design with project portfolio and full-screen galleries

seo.name: SEO
seo.detail: Advanced Local SEO: optimized Google Business, LocalBusiness schema, NAP citations

ichnusa.subtitle: Website for Sardinian Restaurant in Prague
ichnusa.description: Ichnusa Botega & Bistro is an authentic Sardinian restaurant in the heart of Malá Strana, Prague. We built a trilingual website (IT/EN/CS) that captures the essence of Sardinian cuisine: from porceddu to culurgiones, fresh seafood to Cannonau wines. The site integrates online reservation via DISH.co, interactive menu with categories, live Google Reviews (4.7/5 with 497 reviews), private events section and newsletter. Local SEO optimized to rank the restaurant in Prague searches, with Restaurant schema markup and hreflang for three languages.

webDesign.name: Web Design
webDesign.detail: Elegant design with full-screen hero, interactive menu and photo gallery

seo.name: Local SEO
seo.detail: Restaurant schema, Google Business, trilingual hreflang, Prague local keywords

i18n.name: Multilingual
i18n.detail: Full website in Italian, English and Czech with next-intl
